oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of BF(2) Complexes of Prodigiosin Type Oligopyrroles
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAO, MR
TIWARI, MD
BELLARE, JR
RAVIKANTH, M
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: PORPHYRIN COMPLEXES
BINUCLEATING LIGAND
EXPANDED PORPHYRIN
BORON COMPLEXES
CHEMISTRY
BODIPY
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We developed a simple, facile route for the synthesis of BF(2) complexes of prodigiosin type oligopyrroles and their cholesterol conjugates. This route gives an access to synthesize any desired meso-aryl-substituted 3-pyrrolyl BODIPYs which were not easily accessible earlier.
